data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
The first-half is over at Madejski Stadium.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Ovie Ejaria.
Great play from Lucas Joao to set up the goal.
In the minute 56, The away team replace Famara Diedhiou with Chris Martin.
Dean Holden (Bristol City) is making a second substitution, with Nahki Wells replacing Tommy Rowe.
Taylor Moore (Bristol City) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 70, At Madejski Stadium, Chris Martin has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Dean Holden is making the team's third substitution at Madejski Stadium with Chris Brunt replacing Adam Nagy.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Nahki Wells.
In the minute 76, Goal! Reading have got their heads in front thanks to a Yakou Meite strike.
Michael Olise with an assist there.
Alfa Semedo is replacing Michael Olise for the home team.
In the minute 86, Opi Edwards is on a sub for Jack Hunt for Bristol City.
Han-Noah Massengo is replacing Callum O'Dowda for Bristol City at Madejski Stadium.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Reading extend their lead to 3-1 through Lucas Joao.
That's a fine assist from Yakou Meite.
Reading make their second substitution with Sone Aluko replacing Ovie Ejaria.
The home team have replaced Yakou Meite with Tomas Esteves. This is the third substitution made today by Veljko Paunovic.
